body:
fot the people using tcsh (jaguar):


 in:
etc/csh.login


 add this:


setenv DISPLAY localhost:0 ; setenv DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH




open X11 an then use the terminal to lauch graphical stuff


cheers,
giulio
